alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson and northeastern Holmes Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Graceville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Graceville, Esto, Noma, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Bethlehem, Tendil Crossing, Browntown and Noma Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
